_description: Configuration for simple protein sequence design

_parameter_descriptions.chains: Space-separated chain IDs to design (e.g., 'A B' or 'A')
_parameter_descriptions.num_sequences: Number of sequences to generate per target (1-100)
_parameter_descriptions.temperature: Sampling temperature (0.1-0.3 recommended, lower = less diverse)
_parameter_descriptions.model: ProteinMPNN model version (v_48_002, v_48_010, v_48_020, v_48_030)

basic_design.description: Basic design for a protein complex
